text.0: beautiful vāyu come for thee these soma drops have been prepared.
text.1: drink of them hearken to our call.
text.2: knowing the days with soma juice poured forth the singers glorify.
text.3: thee vāyu with their hymns of praise.
text.4: vāyu thy penetrating stream goes forth unto the worshipper.
text.6: these indravāyu have been shed come for our offered dainties sake.
text.7: the drops are yearning for you both.
text.8: well do ye mark libations ye vāyu and indra rich in spoil.
text.10: vāyu and indra come to what the somapresser hath prepared.
text.11: soon heroes thus i make my prayer.
text.12: mitra of holy strength i call and foedestroying varuṇa.
text.13: who make the oilfed rite complete.
text.14: mitra and varuṇa through law lovers and cherishers of law.
text.15: have ye obtained your might power.
text.16: our sages mitravaruṇa wide dominion strong by birth.
text.17: vouchsafe us strength that worketh well.
